org.hps.record.et

Class EtConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.record.et.EtConnection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EtParallelStation

    public class EtConnection
extends Object
    A class for encapsulating the connection information for an ET client including the EtSystem and EtAttachment objects.

    • Method Detail

      • createConnection

        public static EtConnection createConnection(String name,
                                            String host,
                                            int port,
                                            boolean blocking,
                                            int queueSize,
                                            int prescale,
                                            String stationName,
                                            int stationPosition,
                                            org.jlab.coda.et.enums.Mode waitMode,
                                            int waitTime,
                                            int chunkSize)
        Create an EtConnection with full list of configuration parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the ET system e.g. the buffer file on disk
        host - the name of the network host
        port - the port of the network host
        blocking - true for blocking behavior
        queueSize - the queue size
        prescale - the event prescale factor or 0 for none
        stationName - the name of the ET station
        stationPosition - he position of the ET station
        waitMode - the wait mode
        waitTime - the wait time if using timed wait mode
        chunkSize - the number of ET events to return at once
        Returns:
        the EtConnection created from the parameters

      • createDefaultConnection

        public static EtConnection createDefaultConnection()
        Create an EtConnection with a set of default parameters.
        Returns:
        an EtConnection with default parameters

      • readEtEvents

        public org.jlab.coda.et.EtEvent[] readEtEvents()
                                        throws IOException,
                                               org.jlab.coda.et.exception.EtException,
                                               org.jlab.coda.et.exception.EtDeadException,
                                               org.jlab.coda.et.exception.EtEmptyException,
                                               org.jlab.coda.et.exception.EtBusyException,
                                               org.jlab.coda.et.exception.EtTimeoutException,
                                               org.jlab.coda.et.exception.EtWakeUpException,
                                               org.jlab.coda.et.exception.EtClosedException
        Read an array of EtEvent objects from the ET server.

        Method signature preserves all specific exception types in the throws clause so that the caller may easily implement their own error and state handling depending on the kind of error that was thrown.

        Returns:
        The array of EtEvents.
        Throws:
        IOException - if getEvents throws this exception type
        org.jlab.coda.et.exception.EtException - if getEvents throws this exception type
        org.jlab.coda.et.exception.EtDeadException - if getEvents throws this exception type
        org.jlab.coda.et.exception.EtEmptyException - if getEvents throws this exception type
        org.jlab.coda.et.exception.EtBusyException - if getEvents throws this exception type
        org.jlab.coda.et.exception.EtTimeoutException - if getEvents throws this exception type
        org.jlab.coda.et.exception.EtWakeUpException - if getEvents throws this exception type
        org.jlab.coda.et.exception.EtClosedException - if getEvents throws this exception type
